text: Three women filed a new class action lawsuit against Harvey Weinstein on Friday, including one who alleged that Weinstein raped her after she came to his office to pitch her internet startup. The woman, Melissa Thompson, accuses Weinstein of luring her to his hotel room for a meeting in 2011 and then forcibly raping her. “ Thompson was fighting back, but could not out - muscle him, ” the lawsuit states. “ Thompson closed her eyes, traumatized, praying for the assault to end. ” Earlier that day, Thompson said that she went to Weinstein ’ s Tribeca office to pitch him on a marketing startup called Intercast Networks.
